name: Qi Zhang 0041
content: Qi ZHANG's Homepage Hi there, I'm ZHANG Qi (张琦)! August 2022-Now, Assistant Professor (tenure-track) with Visual Computing Research Center (led by Prof. Hui Huang), College of Computer Science and Software Engineering, Shenzhen University (VCC, CSSE, SZU). From May 2021-April 2022, I was a Post-doc researcher at VISAL, Department of Computer Science, City University of Hong Kong, supervised by Prof. Antoni Chan. I earned my Ph.D. degree from the same lab in 2021. My research interests include Crowd Analysis and Simulation, 3D Reconstruction and Generation, Autonomous Driving, and Large-scene Point Cloud Analysis. Read more about me.
